RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS in_IN confinement_NN at_IN the_DT Tezpur_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP during_IN the_DT three_CD years_NNS dealt_VBZ with_IN in_IN this_DT Report_NNP was_VBD 298_CD ,_, 303_CD and_CC 355_CD ,_, respectively_RB ._.
Admissions_NNS and_CC re-admissions_NNS numbered_VBD 66_CD in_IN 1912_CD ,_, 74_CD in_IN 1913_CD ,_, and_CC 95_CD in_IN 1914_CD ._.
The_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT two_CD later_JJR years_NNS was_VBD mainly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN lunatics_NNS from_IN Sylhet_NNP and_CC Cachar_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD previously_RB been_VBN admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Dacca_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, were_VBD received_VBN at_IN Tezpur_NNP from_IN the_DT later_JJ part_NN of_IN 1913_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
At_IN his_PRP$ visit_NN to_TO the_DT Asylum_NNP in_IN 1912_CD Sir_NNP Arohdale_NNP Earle_NNP found_VBD the_DT accommodation_NN entirely_RB insufficient_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD serious_JJ overcrowding_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS suffered_VBD particularly_RB from_IN the_DT inadequacy_NN of_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN segregating_VBG tuberculous_JJ cases_NNS ._.
A_DT project_NN for_IN re-constructing_VBG the_DT building_NN at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN over_IN three_CD and_CC a_DT half_NN lakhs_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prepared_VBN and_CC the_DT work_NN on_IN it_PRP has_VBZ commenced_VBN ._.
Meanwhile_RB adequate_JJ temporary_JJ accommodation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN provided_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ that_IN the_DT result_NN has_VBZ j_NN &_CC gt_NN ;_: roved_VBN so_RB successful_JJ ._.

In_IN 1914_CD ,_, the_DT rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN amongst_VBP the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT Asylum_NNP was_VBD lower_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ province_NN of_IN India_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

In_IN 1917_CD ,_, the_DT rate_NN of_IN mortality_NN among_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 5*56_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, was_VBD lcwer_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT other_JJ province_NN in_IN India_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
